name: Planetesimal Games Collection
description:
Preface

During the short time we were working under the team name Planetesimal Games, I truly discovered my passion for game development. This is a little tribute for the good times and the amazing ideas we had and shared together. This game contains our first 2 games released, Digimech and Sprout, both made during gamejams, packaged in our classic style. Thank you to everyone that made this possible, and thank you for playing this game.

Controls Digimech

- A & D to move.
- Space to jump.
- Lmb to destroy enemies.

Sprout

- A & D to move.
- Space to jump.
